title: Poslat okaz e-mailem
content:
Dorý den. Asi před 14 dny se mi ve Firefoxu se velmi zpomalila (trvá velice dlouho - v řádu několika minut) a téměř nefunguje možnost " poslat okaz e-mailem". Mám OS Windows 10 a Používám e-mailovou adresu "seznam.cz". Stejný problém ve stejnou dobu se projevil i na druhém PC s OS Windows W 8.1 a e-mailovou adresou také na "seznam.cz". Žádné změny v nastavení prohlížeče Firefox ani Seznam jsem v době vzniku potíží ani na jednom PC nepováděl. Nefunguje ani příkaz na obrazovce vlevo nahoře ze" Soubor" - "Poslat odkaz e-mailem" - viz. předchozí popis. Zkopírování např. adresy https://www.denik.cz/regiony/ do mého e-mailu a odeslání funguje normálně

Děkuji za odpověď. Ivan
creator: ivrana

title: Where has the "keyword" field gone? Quick way to add keyword bookmarks?
content:
Hi! Ever since Quantum, I haven't paid much attention to Firefox (not much of a point, is there -_-). But today, I found myself using modern Firefox again and wanted to add a keyword search bookmark. Where has the "keyword" field gone from the "Add Bookmark" dialog? Is there a way to bring it back? I found nothing promising under about:config :(

All I see when googling is guides saying I should first add a bookmark, then go to the bookmarks panel, find and select my new bookmark, edit properties, and then I'll be allowed, by Firefox's grace, to add/edit keywords. This takes all of the convenience out of the process.

Does anyone maybe know an extension that can bring the field back?

Thank you all :)
creator: svArtist

title: CHANGING EMAIL ADDRESS BUT RETAINING SAVED POCKET ARTICLES
content: Of necessity I've changed my email address. My earlier, saved, Pocket articles remain accessible if I enter the name of my previous email address & password but, as the address is now not sustained, I cannot add to Pocket. I wish to be able to add new articles to Pocket using my new email address, but not lose those articles already saved. I see that I can create a secondary account, but have not been able to establish whether this 'wipes' Pocket articles saved previously. Your help would be appreciated.

title: Bing!!!

I have followed several threads about this issue without permanent resolution. Help??

title: never sent email with code to authorise login to my account after samsung copied all data to new phone.
content:
I used Samsung smart switch to transfer data to new phone. When I tried to sync Firefox on new phone with my PC, old phone and tablet I was asked to type in the authorisation code. No matter how I have set my e-mail accounts no e-mail is received in my spam folder or in-box. There is no way to contact Mozilla to resolve this. I have not received any e-mail to state that my sign in was blocked for security reasons nor have I received an error code. I setup a bugzilla account and tried to request that my account be unlocked but there was no way to do this. All it has done is to create an entry that I reported "Zarro Boogs found". How do I get my account unblocked as the advice on the help pages is no advice.

[Personal information removed by moderator. Please read Mozilla Support rules and guidelines, thanks.]

title: Restoring Synced Data After Accidental Deletion
content: Hello there, I somehow recently managed to delete my account by accident and I'm wondering whether it's possible to restore the sync data left behind, I have access to the recovery keys if required and can attempt to provide any information requested about the account. Not sure if it is even possible to restore the data using this method but it's worth a try at least. Appreciative of any assistance with this problem, thanks again :).
creator: Aldraxic

title: conta no sync
content: não preciso de ajuda. Esse apenas é um comunicado de que eu estou desistindo de usar o serviço “sync”, que seria útil. Eu esqueci a password. A *cada* tentativa, é preciso acessar o email e colocar um código grande de autorização. A cada tentativa. A seguir, quando tento colocar uma senha que consiga lembrar, a qual tem: letra maiúscula, símbolo e número, ainda assim não atende às exigências de segurança do Firefox, que eu considero um browser - e uma proposta - excelente. Uma pena. Todas as minhas senhas consigo configurar em todas as plataformas, absolutamente todas, exceto no Firefox. Mas o que me fez desistir é o alerta de que posso perder meus favoritos, colecionados durante ANOS, organizados por assuntos, e são centenas. Desisto. O sync parece ser para os profissionais.
creator: fabionin

title: Netflix, Twitch, HBOMax aren't playing video
content: I've tried using the websites in the title all day and none of them work at all. Netfilx gives me the 7701 error code, Twitch gives me the error #4000, and HBOMax and Disney+ stay loading. I've tried a lot of the solutions I've seen (turn on and off the drm player, delete cookies, reset cache, refreash firefox, uninstalling and reinstalling firefox, updating drivers, removing all addons) and none of them have worked. The same thing happens with Opera. I've tried using Chrome and that seems to be working well so I don't think it has to do witth my computer.
